ingredients.ingredient: 12 fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded

cookingTips: Wear gloves when handling jalapenos to protect your hands from the capsaicin oils
Soften cream cheese at room temperature for easier filling and more even distribution
Pat bacon halves dry before wrapping for better contact with jalapenos during baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you balance the heat of jalapenos with creamy filling and smoky bacon for the perfect appetizer?
